title: Shock III: 13 Electrifying Tales
description: Contents:Girl of My Dreams · ss F&SF Oct ’63 ’Tis the Season to Be Jelly · ss F&SF Jun ’63 Return · ss Thrilling Wonder Stories Oct ’51 The Jazz Machine · pm F&SF Feb ’63 The Disinheritors · ss Fantastic Story Magazine Jan ’53 Slaughter House · nv Weird Tales Jul ’53 Shock Wave [“Crescendo”] · ss Gamma #1 ’63 When the Waker Sleeps [“The Waker Dreams”] · ss Galaxy Dec ’50 Witch War · ss Startling Stories Jul ’51 First Anniversary · ss Playboy Jul ’60 Miss Stardust · ss Startling Stories Spr ’55 Full Circle · ss Fantastic Universe Aug/Sep ’53 Nightmare at 20,000 Feet · ss Alone By Night, ed.
